attributes.action: To cover sickle cell in life insurance
attributes.additional_details: The number of people with this disease will increase due to more births and increased population.
attributes.background: It is estimated that there are between 12,500 and 15,000 people with sickle cell disease in the UK.  I think it is inhuman that people with this disease or trait of this disease cannot qualify for life insurance.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the terms of insurance policies - this is a matter for insurance providers.
